name: CatholicPrayers(French)
0:
caret
”Alexa, open catholic prayers french”
”Alexa, ask catholic prayers french to do hail mary”
”Alexa, ask catholic prayers french to pick a prayer”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: catholic prayers french
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Disclaimer: The skill content, for the prayers, is in French.

Have your Alexa say a prayer for you anytime you like. Just ask it to say a prayer from the list below or you can ask it to pick one for you by saying "pick a prayer."

You can also listen to all the prayers with two other voices: Father David and Sister Angie.

List of Prayers:

Le signe de la croix (The Sign of the Cross in French)
Notre Père (Our Father/The Lord's Prayer in French)
Je vous salue Marie (Hail Mary in French)
Gloire au Père (Glory Be in French)
Le credo de l'apôtre (The Apostle's Creed in French)
Je vous salue, Sainte Reine (Hail Holy Queen in French)
Anima Christi (in French)
Souvenez-vous (Memorare in French)
L'Angélus (The Angelus in French)
Prière de Saint Michel (Saint Michael Prayer in French)
Le Rosaire (Abridged) (The Rosary in French)
Le Rosaire (The Rosary in French)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
